Class Regimes

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes
@StaticUtility public final class Regimes extends Object
Static factory methods for creating and configuring common Regime strategies.

This utility class provides convenient shortcuts to construct standard training regimes such as full-batch, mini-batch, or online training, as well as builders for chained regimes with additional behaviors (e.g., multiple epochs, reporting, or dumping neuron states).

      Creates a mini-batch training regime with the given batch size.
      Parameters:
      batchSize - the number of samples per mini-batch (must be > 0)
      Returns:
      a new MiniBatchRegime

      public static ChainedRegime.Builder epochs(int epochs)
      Starts building a chained regime that repeats training for a given number of epochs.
      Parameters:
      epochs - the number of epochs (must be > 0)
      Returns:
      a ChainedRegime.Builder preconfigured with epoch count

      public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes()
      Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states after training.
      Returns:
      a ChainedRegime.Builder preconfigured to dump nodes

    • dumpNodes

      public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime)
      Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states, optionally only during the first pass.
      Parameters:
      firstTime - if true, dump nodes only once
      Returns:
      a ChainedRegime.Builder preconfigured to dump nodes

    • dumpNodes

      public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs)
      Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states, optionally only during the first pass and optionally including input neurons.
      Parameters:
      firstTime - if true, dump nodes only once
      includeInputs - if true, include input nodes in the dump
      Returns:
      a ChainedRegime.Builder preconfigured to dump nodes
